C I R C U L A R NO. 09 / 2Q04
Subject: 
Checked-in baggage reconciliation system at civil airports in India.
.
In supersession of this Bureau Circular No. CAS-25(2)87/Div.1 dated
4-5-92 regarding identification of checked-in baggage, henceforth the Checked-in
baggage reconciliation system, specified vide this Bureau Circular No. CAS-
25( 6)96/Div.1 dated 28-10-96 (copy enclosed), shall be implemented by all air
carriers operating to/from civil airports in India with immediate effect.

( R. K. Singh )
